name: dftp2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wceq(ctp(c0, c1, c2), cab(s0, w3o(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c2))))

comment: Alternate definition of unordered triple of classes. Special case of Definition 5.3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 16. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1994.)
